meanings.definition: More stylish or attractive in appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her new dress is snazzier than her old one.
meanings.sent2: The snazzier outfit caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: She felt snazzier than a movie star in her fancy gown.
meanings.sent4: The city lights at night looked even snazzier from the top of the skyscraper.
meanings.sent5: The snazzier decorations made the party unforgettable.

meanings.definition: More elaborate or showy in design or style.
meanings.sent1: The snazzier car had more chrome details.
meanings.sent2: The snazzier furniture in the showroom was more expensive.
meanings.sent3: The snazzier cake was almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her snazzier jewelry collection sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The snazzier stage costumes stole the show.
